description: Client side event fired when a user clicks on any content in the feed (Forecast or Surf).

category.description: The event category (used to group related events).

contentId.description: The content ID of the feed item.

contentType.description: The content type of the feed item.

feedLocale.description: The locale of the feed item.

isPremium.description: Whether the feed item is premium only.

isPremiumArticle.description: Whether the feed item is a premium article.

isSponsoredArticle.description: Whether the feed item is a sponsored article.

isVideo.description: Whether the feed item is a video.

location.description: Where the event fired on our application.

mediaType.description: The media type of the feed item.

postSeries.description: The post series of the feed item.

postcategory.description: The event category (used to group related events).

spotReliveRating.description: The rating of the feed item.

tags.description: The tags of the feed item.

text.description: The text of the feed item.

title.description: The title of the feed item.
